divs: sighting detailsto whomever keeps posting these comments about another sighting. the mufon cms system is not a forum. it is for reporting unusual events and phenomena and nothing else. if you wish to make comments about a particular report, please visit http:\\www.mufoncentral.com or send an email to hq@mufon.com. mufon investigators are quite adept at spotting hoaxes and misidentifications, regardless of how silly they may seem. please refrain from further comments as they will also be removed. thank you terry groff deputy director of investigations
